Step into Frederic Chopin's shoes, and go on a magical journey.

Accompany Chopin in his amazing journey full of humorous events. Battle your opponents in musical duels. 

Laugh till your stomach hurts with an hour of animated comic. Play through nine catchy arrangements of Chopin's greatest classics. Practice your skills until perfection.

Features:

- 10 fantastic remixes of classical hits
- 9 locations from around the world
- An hour of outstanding animated comic
- Megatons of humor
- 18 achievements of all difficulties
